name: Forester (ItsCalamity_)
description:
Welcome to the Forest!

You, a lone caveman, must venture through the wilderness to gather and collect berries and wood! While yes, it may seem relatively simple, there's one small catch...

They all spawn at RANDOM!

Have fun running about whilst trying to guess where each item spawns, as no matter how clever you think you are, the pattern of berries spawning will always be at random points (Oh, and the wood? Yeah... that's also random!)

This is only my second game I ever truly devoted time to, so hopefully you enjoy playing it!

Controls:

WASD to move

P to bring up the pause menu

Esc to make it hide

Touching the berries/ wood with the mouse will automatically make it disappear

(Note: the "B" in the top left corner means "Berries" and the "W" means "Wood")
